üöÄ PIPELINE DE INOVA√á√ÉO

### üìä **VIS√ÉO GERAL DO PIPELINE** 
TABLE choice(status, "üí°","üìã","üöß","üß™","üöÄ") AS "Status",
 link(file.link, title) AS "Projeto",
 owner AS "Owner",
 effort_weeks + "w" AS "Esfor√ßo",
 "R$ " + budget AS "Budget"
FROM "4-Projetos"
WHERE (type = "project" OR type = "pilot") AND status != "template" AND type != "template"
SORT status, priority DESC, file.cday ASC
LIMIT 10

M√©tricas por Status

TABLE length(rows) as "Quantidade",
 round(sum(budget) / 1000, 1) + "k" as "Or√ßamento Total (R$)"
FROM "4-Projetos"
WHERE (type = "project" OR type = "pilot") AND status != "template" AND type != "template"
GROUP BY status
SORT length(rows) DESC

üí∞ PERFORMANCE FINANCEIRA

### üí∞ **AN√ÅLISE FINANCEIRA** - **Budget Total**: R$ 297.000 - **Receita Projetada**: R$ 1.031.000 - **ROI M√©dio**: 347% - **Payback**: 3 meses

Budget por Prioridade

TABLE length(rows) as "Quantidade",
 round(sum(budget) / 1000, 1) + "k" as "Or√ßamento Total (R$)"
FROM "4-Projetos"
WHERE (type = "project" OR type = "pilot") AND status != "template" AND type != "template"
GROUP BY priority
SORT priority DESC

Distribui√ß√£o de Budget

pie title Distribui√ß√£o de Budget por Prioridade
    "Alta Prioridade" : 180
    "M√©dia Prioridade" : 100

ROI por Projeto

TABLE link(file.link, title) AS "Projeto",
 "R$ " + budget AS "Investimento",
 "R$ " + (budget * 1.5) AS "Retorno Esperado",
 "50%" AS "ROI"
FROM "4-Projetos"
WHERE type = "project" AND status = "deployed" AND status != "template" AND type != "template"
SORT budget DESC
LIMIT 5

üë• EQUIPE E PERFORMANCE

Projetos por Owner

TABLE length(rows) as "Projetos",
 round(sum(budget) / 1000, 1) + "k" as "Budget Total (R$)",
 round(avg(effort_weeks), 1) + "w" as "Esfor√ßo M√©dio"
FROM "4-Projetos"
WHERE (type = "project" OR type = "pilot") AND status != "template" AND type != "template"
GROUP BY owner
SORT length(rows) DESC

üîí COMPLIANCE E GOVERNAN√áA

Status de Compliance

  • Projetos N√≠vel 1: = length(filter(file("4-Projetos").file, (f) => f.compliance_level = 1))
  • Projetos N√≠vel 2: = length(filter(file("4-Projetos").file, (f) => f.compliance_level = 2))
  • Projetos N√≠vel 3: = length(filter(file("4-Projetos").file, (f) => f.compliance_level = 3))

Revis√µes Legais Pendentes

TABLE link(file.link, title) AS "Projeto",
 owner AS "Owner",
 compliance_level AS "N√≠vel"
FROM "4-Projetos"
WHERE legal_review = false AND compliance_level > 1
SORT compliance_level DESC
